text: I am using Flux and Metalhead (among many other packages). It seems that the latest version of Metalhead is forcing Flux to stay at a slightly older version (0.11.1). Is there any workaround so I can use the latest version of Flux (0.11.3), or is such a workaround not recommended? Metalhead's Project.toml only requires Flux to be 0.11, so I'm guessing it is due to other interdependencies?

text: Did you try `up` as well? If that doesn't do anything you could try `add Flux@0.11.3`

text: Do let us know if you get it working, we should fix the compat as necessary

text: I tried `add Flux@0.11.3`  but it didn't work. i ended up getting rid of Metalhead as a dependency (since MLDatasets was sufficient for what I needed).
